article_title: Lazard Names Fassbender Chairman for Germany, Austria, CEE
article_text: SHARE THIS ARTICLE   Share   Tweet   Post   Email  {"contentId":"LHD9SB6JIJWB01","position":"brokerboxarticle","dimensions":{"large_desktop":[[120,60]],"small_desktop":[[120,60]],"tablet":[[120,60]]},"strategy":"viewable","positionIncrement":1,"targeting":{"position":"brokerboxarticle1","url":"/news/articles/2011-03-01/lazard-names-fassbender-chairman-for-germany-austria-cee-1-"},"containerId":"brokerboxarticle-710JNhw"}   Lazard Ltd., the world’s largest independent merger adviser, named Ernst Fassbender chairman for Germany, Austria, as well as central and eastern Europe.    Alexander Doll and Eric Fellhauer, who were appointed co-heads of investment banking for Germany, have taken over operational responsibilities, a spokesman for the bank said by phone today, confirming a report by Financial Times Deutschland.    {"contentId":"LHD9SB6JIJWB01","position":"outstream","dimensions":{"large_desktop":[[1,8]],"small_desktop":[[1,8]],"tablet":[[1,8]]},"strategy":"always","type":"Outstream Video Native Ad","targeting":{"position":"outstream","url":"/news/articles/2011-03-01/lazard-names-fassbender-chairman-for-germany-austria-cee-1-"},"containerId":"outstream-video-1-LHD9SB6JIJWB01"}   {"contentId":"LHD9SB6JIJWB01","position":"outstream","dimensions":{"mobile":[[1,8]]},"strategy":"always","type":"Outstream Video Native Ad","targeting":{"position":"outstream","url":"/news/articles/2011-03-01/lazard-names-fassbender-chairman-for-germany-austria-cee-1-"},"containerId":"outstream-video-2-LHD9SB6JIJWB01"}   Lazard, based in Hamilton, Bermuda, oversaw more than $23 billion in mergers and acquisitions in Germany last year, ranking sixth, according to data compiled by Bloomberg. The firm advised BASF SE, the world’s largest chemicals company, on its purchase of Cognis Holding GmbH, and Deutsche Bahn AG, Germany’s state-owned railway, on its acquisition of U.K. bus and train operator Arriva Plc.    {"contentId":"LHD9SB6JIJWB01","position":"box","dimensions":{"mobile":[[300,250],[3,3],[1,1],"fluid"]},"type":"Mobile Body Box Ad","positionIncrement":1,"targeting":{"position":"box1","positionIncrement":1,"url":"/news/articles/2011-03-01/lazard-names-fassbender-chairman-for-germany-austria-cee-1-"},"containerId":"box-aMTeL9g"}   Lazard, led by Chief Executive Officer Kenneth Jacobs, last month reported fourth-quarter profit that beat analysts’ estimates as revenue from advising on takeovers increased.    (Updates with Lazard’s German deals in third paragraph.)   Published on ‎1‎ ‎March‎, ‎2011‎ ‎09‎:‎31        Have a confidential tip for our reporters?
